InspiringApps, Boulder, Colorado

InspiringApps is a team of app experts working collaboratively in an awesome downtown Boulder location. If you like autonomy, opportunity, and frosty beers on a Friday afternoon with a company that is building compelling mobile apps with the latest technology, this could be your gig.

WHAT WE OFFER:

- A top-notch team of smart individuals

- Interesting and challenging work

- Competitive salary

- Insurance stipend

- Awesome view of the Flatirons from our downtown Boulder office

- RTD EcoPass

To apply, send us a note to jobs@inspiringapps.com including your resume and code samples.

We are currently looking for Senior JavaScript developers, iOS developers, and a Project Manager/Quality Control Specialist.

http://www.inspiringapps.com/about/jobs/
